answers.answer: Thats awsome :) just womdering why they changed it to 28 days?

28 days is our goal date! That is if he stays cooking that long! Already really low and cervix is really thin. He finally moved to head down so unless he flips again (god I hope not) we will be in business!! I'm ready for this to be over!!
Thats crazy. I was 2cm & 50% at 36w and went to 40.4
Why would you want to have your baby almost3w early? Ft is 39w
He is already soo big. And I'm not a very big person,ive been soo miserable from pressure and contractions for the last month! And 28 days puts me at 37 weeks, he is estimated to be 8lbs+ by then.

That is if we even make it that far... this isn't my first rodeo, 3rd in fact,i know the longer the better but being in this kind of pain constantly I'm over it. I can't walk, I can't sit, I can't lay down.... 28 more days I can handle that!

I am being induced at 39 weeks if he doesn't come at 37 your baby is full term at 37 so it isn't dangerous if you have gestational diabetes you can end up with a 12 lb baby so my doctor wants him born early so he doesn't get to big sense my blood sugar is very high and hasn't come down
Luckily nothing like that! I've been on bed rest to try and keep him cooking for a little while longer. BUT STILL EXCITED!!!

question: I would originally have 48 days left, but today it got cut almost in half!! 28 days and I get to meet my little man!!!
title: bragging!!
